netapp_order_performance_level_descripti: Choose the level of service performance you need
netapp_order_performance_level_type_Prem: A balance between price and performance.
netapp_order_performance_level_type_Extr: For when your business needs high bandwidth.
netapp_order_size_description: Specify the total storage capacity you want for your Enterprise File Storage service.
netapp_order_performance_level_type_Prem: 64 MB/s and 4,000 IOPS per TB provisioned.
netapp_order_performance_customization: When you provision your capacity, you can also define the performance level of your service. As a reminder, 64 MB/s and 4000 IOPS per TB provisioned.
